response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. We are confident it will serve you well and enhance your experience. Considering its unique features and benefits, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. We believe this is a fair and advantageous opportunity for both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
